type: REHABILITATION OF PARKING LOT AND STORM SEWER CONSTRUCTION
short_summary: Rehabilitation of parking lot and storm sewer construction at Martineau Community Correctional Centre (CCC Martineau) in Montreal, Quebec, Canada
description: The project involves the rehabilitation of the parking lot at the Martineau Community Correctional Centre (CCC Martineau)  and the construction of a storm sewer including the connection to the existing municipal infrastructure.
tags: highway and road new construction service
full_summary:
=====================================

**Contract Title (Titre de la marche)**

21301-232621: Setting the Drainage System and Parking Paving to Standards, CCC Martineau

**Reference Number (Numéro de référence)**

WS4308127542-Doc4387092733

**Announcement Details (Détails de l'annonce)**

* **Publication Date (Date de publication)**: 2024-01-15
* **Tender Closing Date (Date limite de soumission)**: 2024-03-01T14:00:00 EST (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date (Date prévue de début de contrat)**: 2024-03-01T14:00:00 EST (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Expected Contract End Date (Date prévue de fin de contrat)**: Ongoing until further notice

**Project Overview (Résumé du projet)**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Correctional Service Canada (CSC), is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the rehabilitation of the parking lot at the Martineau Community Correctional Centre (CCC Martineau) in Montreal, QC, Canada. The project includes the installation of a storm sewer connected to the existing municipal infrastructure. A detailed description of the requirement can be found in the attached solicitation.

* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5 Canada
* **Contact Person**: Annabelle Cloutier
* **Email**: annabelle.cloutier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
